White_Plains.Mamaroneck, New York:
Mamaroneck (, mə-MARE-ə-nek) is a town in Westchester County, New York, United States.
The population was 29,156 at the 2010 census. There are two villages contained within the town: Larchmont and the Village of Mamaroneck (part of which is located in the adjacent town of Rye).
